sig_info: Special 1: Power Sting has a 100% chance to inflict a 0.5 to 1.2 second Stun Debuff if it expires after lasting its full duration.
Special 2: Gain +4 Core Charge when Petrify ends.
Special 3: Power Sting has a 100% chance to re-apply itself once activated. Chance decreases by 50 to 10.02% each time this happens.

NUCLEAR CORE - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Starting Charge: 40. Overheat Point: 100+
Each Charge increases the Potency of personal Debuffs by 1% & reduces the opponent’s Regeneration Rate by 1%.
Either Champion lands a hit: +1 Charge. 60% Chance.
Opponent Launches a Special Attack: +10 Charge. 100% Chance.
NUCLEAR CORE - MELTDOWN: When Charge is gained above the Overheat Point, there’s a chance to enter Meltdown for 12 seconds. Chance increases with Charge.
While Meltdown is active: Any contact with the opponent has a 75% chance to inflict a burst of 31.5 Physical Damage on them.
When Meltdown ends: Reset Core back to Starting Charge.
INCOMING UNBLOCKABLE SPECIAL ATTACKS: Each hit has 100% chance to spend 10 Nuclear Core Charge to reduce the opponent’s Attack Rating by 75%.
SPECIAL ATTACKS - MYSTIC OPPONENT: Personal Debuffs trigger when the attack is launched instead of on hit and they are Paused for the duration of the attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflicts up to 3 Power Sting Debuffs, with each having a 90% chance to activate and lasting 10 seconds. An opponent with Power Sting takes 67.5 direct damage if they activate a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Petrify Debuff of 50% Potency for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict an indefinite Power Sting Debuff causing 198 direct damage to the opponent if they activate a Special Attack.

sig_info: Special 1: Power Sting has a 100% chance to inflict a 0.5 to 1.2 second Stun Debuff if it expires after lasting its full duration.
Special 2: Gain +4 Core Charge when Petrify ends.
Special 3: Power Sting has a 100% chance to re-apply itself once activated. Chance decreases by 50 to 10.02% each time this happens.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Inflicts up to 3 Power Sting Debuffs, with each having a 90% chance to activate and lasting 10 seconds. An opponent with Power Sting takes 1476.75 direct damage if they activate a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Petrify Debuff of 50% Potency for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict an indefinite Power Sting Debuff causing 4331.8 direct damage to the opponent if they activate a Special Attack.

sig_info: Special 1: Power Sting has a 100% chance to inflict a 0.7 to 2.1 second Stun Debuff if it expires after lasting its full duration.
Special 2: Gain +5 Core Charge when Petrify ends.
Special 3: Power Sting has a 100% chance to re-apply itself once activated. Chance decreases by 45 to 0% each time this happens.

NUCLEAR CORE - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Starting Charge: 40. Overheat Point: 100+
Each Charge increases the Potency of personal Debuffs by 1% & reduces the opponent’s Regeneration Rate by 1%.
Either Champion lands a hit: +1 Charge. 60% Chance.
Opponent Launches a Special Attack: +10 Charge. 100% Chance.
NUCLEAR CORE - MELTDOWN: When Charge is gained above the Overheat Point, there’s a chance to enter Meltdown for 12 seconds. Chance increases with Charge.
While Meltdown is active: Any contact with the opponent has a 75% chance to inflict a burst of 952 Physical Damage on them.
When Meltdown ends: Reset Core back to Starting Charge.
